title: AV Voice Changer Software 6.0.10 with keygen
description:
scanned with bullguard 8.5 and esset..



AV Voice Changer Software stands apart from other online or computer voice changers because of its unlimited ability to change voices and sounds to produce various enhanced voice/sound outputs. NEW BACKGROUND EFFECTS in version 6.0 include nature sounds, public affairs and street voices help you to create an audio environment: in a forest, by a waterfall, or on a train, etc. This computer voice changer software can serve both your business and entertainment purposes: make voice-overs, record voices, disguise gender and age for online fun, etc.


Key Features

Ãƒâ€šÃ‚Â· Changes in real time the voice, either from a microphone, CD, line-in, or auxiliary input, into hundreds of high-quality female and male voices, imal, musical and fiction sounds.
Ãƒâ€šÃ‚Â· Morphs in real time the WaveOut and DirectX streams.
Ãƒâ€šÃ‚Â· Has plenty of ready-to-use audio effects and nickvoices.
Ãƒâ€šÃ‚Â· Compatible with voice chat rooms, voice instant messengers, audio & video conferencing, and PC-to-phone programs. You can disguise your voice to be totally anonymous on the Net.
Ãƒâ€šÃ‚Â· Compatible with the standard sound recorders, sound players, CD and Karaoke players. With AV VCS DIAMOND, you can edit various voices, sound files, sound effects for your audio & video clips and movies, you can morph songs or MP3 files and create your own albums.
Ãƒâ€šÃ‚Â· Voice output can be customized by setting the desired equalization.
Ãƒâ€šÃ‚Â· Along with the pitch algorithm, an additional timbre shifting algorithm helps you change your voice into the comprehensive range of high-quality new natural voices controlling the "age" and the "gender" of the voice output.
Ãƒâ€šÃ‚Â· AV VCS 4.0 DIAMOND can intercept and change not only the recording but also the playback and the DirectX audio streams. You can morph sound files, for example, MP3 files played on a sound player installed on your system.
Ãƒâ€šÃ‚Â· You can add effects from hundreds of plug-in ready-to-use audio effects to a real-time voice stream from a microphone to a sound file, an MP3 composition, or a CD track played back on a sound player or CD player.
Ãƒâ€šÃ‚Â· A combination of pitch/timbre, effects, sound quality, equalization and voice equalization settings is used for creating new nickvoices that can be saved for future use.
Ãƒâ€šÃ‚Â· AV VCS 5.0 DIAMOND has its own sound Recorder which makes it easy for you to record and save your conversations, morphed voice messages, as well as modified songs.
Ãƒâ€šÃ‚Â· AV VCS 5.0 DIAMOND has a built-in Voice Comparator - now you can morph your voice into the voice of famous artist or singer.
Ãƒâ€šÃ‚Â· Any of the audio codecs installed on your system can be used for recording the sound in a compressed format. Also AV VCS DIAMOND has a set of build-in most popular audio codecs.
Ãƒâ€šÃ‚Â· AV VCS 5.0 DIAMOND can automatically start recording, generate names for new recordings, and save them in the folder that you have selected.
Ãƒâ€šÃ‚Â· AV VCS 5.0 DIAMOND has a built-in sound Player - you don&#039;t have to switch to another application to play back your favorite song.
Ãƒâ€šÃ‚Â· Improved graphic equalizer smoothes out the voice output.
Ãƒâ€šÃ‚Â· Nice-looking skins.
Ãƒâ€šÃ‚Â· In the default DIAMOND Hi-Fi skin, the pitch and timbre settings are graph-represented allowing easier tuning.
Ãƒâ€šÃ‚Â· Easy-to-use standard Windows interface included.
Ãƒâ€šÃ‚Â· Fast algorithms.
Ãƒâ€šÃ‚Â· Compatible with all versions of the Microsoft Windows operating systems.
